description: Spectrum Grant parameters provided by a CBSD

$eref.description: Measurement report provided by a CBSD.

eutraCarrierRssiRptObject.description: Report for a particular Carrier RSSI measurement.

___measBandwidth.description: Measurement bandwidth of the channel in Hz.

___measFrequency.description: Frequency of the low end of the measured channel in Hz.

___measCarrierRssi.description: Carrier RSSI measurement of the channel in dBm as per 3GPP TS 32.592.

___eutraCarrierRssiRpt.description: Report structured used by a CBSD when a measurement report type is EutraCarrierRssiNonTx or EutraCarrierRssiAlways

$eref.description: Operational parameters provided for a CBSD

___maxEirp.description: The peak operating power in dBm/MHz to be used by the CBSD within this operating parameter set

___cbsdId.description: Unique designator for the CBSD as returned from the registration procedure.
